tosdr.tldr: Terms of Service bear the line "UNLIMITED DOES NOT MEAN UNREASONABLE USE" regarding all its services. Stating that "Users on our Unlimited Plan may notice reduced data speeds when data usage exceeds an average of 30GB during the current billing month."

title: This service throttles your use
quoteText: Users on our Unlimited Plan may notice reduced data speeds when data usage exceeds an average of 30GB during the current billing month.
